attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app at all, I had bad feelings about it from the beginning and didn’t notice all of the bad reviews. Once I downloaded the app I immediately understood why it was rated very poorly, and decided to leave a review myself.
attributes.title: horrible app❤️

attributes.review: I was hoping this app would allow me to see where his campaign is heading but it would wouldn’t even open. Everything looked like it had been written by a 7 year old and I can’t believe how unprofessional it is.
attributes.title: Worst thing ever!!

attributes.review: Ive been trying to check out all of trumps plans & this app has caused my phone to crash. Every-time i try to go on it , it decides to exit me out & It made my phone very glitchy. Don't come out with an app if it’ll be this catastrophic & awful!
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: This app along with the human it is about is just trash to be completely honest with all of you. There are very many things wrong with this man and I pray to the god I don’t even believe in that this man will not be reelected this coming election. For mine yours and out future generations sake save America!✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: Very bad

attributes.review: I opened the app and there was a Cheeto man working out at a gym and I tapped the screen and trump yelled at me and said I was the n word bc I am tan and then I tapped the screen again to see him trying to track me down and Murder me and my family I tapped again the Cheeto man was getting Murdered by trump
attributes.title: I am scared👁👄👁

attributes.review: why do I need to give my phone number and all my information just to access the app? So annoying. Secondly, this app did not make me feel Great. At all. Absolutely horrible content. This app is one of the many reasons I will NOT be voting trump in the 2020 election.
attributes.title: Not a good app

attributes.review: everytime i clicked the sign up button, the app would freeze up and crash. turned my phone off and on, and this time the app wouldnt even open. the screen would go black after clicking the app, like it was trying to open, but then it would go back to my home screen. uninstalled and reinstalled the app, same thing happened. my phone is updated and my other apps work great, this one is just bad and broken.
attributes.title: crashes

attributes.review: Trash app took weeks to download, when it finally finished it started to glitch. My whole screen turned black. I tried it the next day and it finally open but a weird noise started. This app is just trash, don’t waste your time hun.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING 🤮🤮                  Gen-Z

attributes.review: When I got into the app, the first thing I see was trump naked taking photos of himself in a mirror. This app is gross. Then when I pressed more, there was a picture of a cat that was absolutely disgusting. After that, I scroll down and see so many things I don’t want to talk about.
attributes.title: BAN THIS APP!

attributes.review:
this app and owner of this app is complete ✨trash✨. all I thought about when I opened this app was 🤢blah 🤮hûàhhh🤒 bbüalh🤕. the worst part was when I opened the app and all I saw was 🍊+ 🌽. this app makes me SICK. it makes me BUAHHLAAA. dIsGuStIng. 👁👄👁. please please save your eyes and DO NOT download. do me a favor 🎺 trumpity trumpity🎺
